about_the_game: This world is a broken one. In this first-person 3D single player platformer the player races through the sky while trying to beat the current best time. But is this route actually the fastest one? Use your skills wisely and be eager to find your way beyond shattered isles. While gravitational changes put everything into a new perspective, the increasingly skilled player soon learns how to use different move mechanics like dashing, grappling and double jumps to their best advantage. Discover this broken place and accelerate where you can. Only the fastest will have the praise and the best time at the end! Are you good enough?
